item.description: Kerith Hogan, 43, from Melbourne says she has noticed how tanned the skin of her son Elliot, seven, is becoming, despite sending him to school wearing sunscreen.

item.title: 'You're going to get done by a shark': Surfer's chilling warning before Manly attack

item.title: Greenland is nowhere near as big as it looks on most maps. This is why
item.description: In reality, while still being very large, it's substantially smaller than Western Australia - and not too much bigger than Queensland.
